bug.description:
/kind bug
Issue is extension of <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/issues/4136>#4136</denchmark-link>
Added overlay to update multiple ClusterRoles(eg: argo and argo-ui) using PatchesJson6902 using same target.path file <denchmark-code>apiVersion: kustomize.config.k8s.io/v1beta1 kind: Kustomization bases: - ../../base patchesJson6902: - target: group: rbac.authorization.k8s.io version: v1beta1 kind: ClusterRole name: argo path: patch.yaml - target: group: rbac.authorization.k8s.io version: v1beta1 kind: ClusterRole name: argo-ui path: patch.yaml </denchmark-code>
patch.yaml content is as below <denchmark-code>- op: add path: /rules/0 value: apiGroups: - extensions resourceNames: - privileged resources: - podsecuritypolicies verbs: - use </denchmark-code>

if _, ok := kustomizationMaps[patchesJson6902Map][patchJson.Path]; !ok {
